3073 commun sequenti process thi paper suggest that input and output ar basic primit of program and that parallel composit of commun sequenti process is a fundament program structur method when combin with a develop of dijkstra s guard command these concept ar surprisingli versatil their us is illustr by sampl solut of a varieti of familiar program exercis cacm august 1978 hoar c program program languag program primit program structur parallel program concurr input output guard command nondeterminaci coroutin procedur multipl entri multipl exit class data represent recurs condit critic region monitor iter arrai 4 20 4 22 4 32 ca780805 dh februari 7 1979 10 07 am 249 4 3073 254 4 3073 272 4 3073 1102 4 3073 1109 4 3073 1140 4 3073 1188 4 3073 1306 4 3073 1323 4 3073 1358 4 3073 1380 4 3073 1464 4 3073 1491 4 3073 1665 4 3073 1767 4 3073 1781 4 3073 1781 4 3073 1787 4 3073 1787 4 3073 1949 4 3073 1989 4 3073 321 4 3073 2059 4 3073 2112 4 3073 2126 4 3073 2534 4 3073 2541 4 3073 435 4 3073 437 4 3073 463 4 3073 483 4 3073 491 4 3073 2698 4 3073 2732 4 3073 2733 4 3073 2820 4 3073 2896 4 3073 2972 4 3073 560 4 3073 583 4 3073 3037 4 3073 3039 4 3073 3043 4 3073 3073 4 3073 3073 4 3073 3073 4 3073 3155 4 3073 627 4 3073 631 4 3073 632 4 3073 642 4 3073 644 4 3073 653 4 3073 680 4 3073 761 4 3073 762 4 3073 763 4 3073 123 4 3073 140 4 3073 919 4 3073 989 4 3073 196 5 3073 2732 5 3073 3073 5 3073 3073 5 3073 3073 5 3073 3148 5 3073 3150 5 3073 3155 5 3073 799 5 3073 1860 6 3073 2060 6 3073 2204 6 3073 2247 6 3073 2704 6 3073 2817 6 3073 2842 6 3073 2865 6 3073 2939 6 3073 2939 6 3073 2940 6 3073 2941 6 3073 2943 6 3073 3073 6 3073 3073 6 3073 3073 6 3073 3148 6 3073 799 6 3073
